item.title: Keep Your Composure
item.description: Hey guys, Ernie here with a fresh piece from Andrew Egan, who last hit us with some chatter on sound design in film. This time, he talks about another aural element of the cinematic experience. Today in Tedium: There is no shortage of colloquialisms that advise you to chill out, take it easy, and don’t sweat the small stuff. But details matter. item.title: The Sound and the Fury
item.description: Hey all, Ernie here with a piece from Andrew Egan about a specific kind of movie magicâ€”the kind you hear, whether during a dramatic fall or the crack of a whip. Enjoy! Today in Tedium: Returning to my sunny little Brooklyn apartment a few weeks ago, I heard a familiar sound coming from my living room. It wasn’t music or dialogue but the second I heard it, I knew exactly what one of my roommates was watching in our living room.
